pages.title: Setup
pages.text: Single-block crusher: the blue side takes motor power, inputs feed on that power side, and outputs exit the right face. No wheel installed means no crushing.

pages.title: Core
pages.text: Accepts iron or steel crushing wheels (crusty_chunks:irongear or crusty_chunks:steel_crushing_wheel). Steel wheels last longerâ€”swap before they break to avoid downtime. Pipe outputs straight into digesters or centrifuges and keep the right side clear.
